# Information Management Services
## Notice: Request for Proposal (RFP) WS3826429923-Doc3836858532

### Notice Details
* **RP Title:** Information Management Services
* **Notice Number:** WS3826429923-Doc3836858532
* **Notice Date:** 2023-02-01
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-06T14:00:00 EDT
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-02-27

### Contract Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to engage a contractor to provide Information Management Services (IMS) in support of the Canadian Forces Health Services Training Centre (CFHSTC). The successful contractor will be responsible for identifying and implementing information management systems, procedures, and policies compliant with Level 1 Instructional Management Order (IMO) direction.

The IMS contract will support the overall Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) and military Health Services Personnel intent for training and education. The contractor must have knowledge of information requirements and management capabilities of all staff sections within the training centre.

### Key Requirements
* Contractor must be available from Award to 1st April 2024 + 3, one-year option periods from 1 April 2024 to 31 March 2027
* Contractor must have resources available within thirty (30) calendar days of request from Award
* The IMS is responsible to the CFHSTC Chief Instructor (CI) for coordinating IM procedures within the headquarters

### Evaluation Criteria
The bid will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Lowest Price
